entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain showers or periods of drizzle late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
